content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. At this time, I am looking to rent out the property for the highest possible price. Could you provide an offer for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would be willing to offer 600€ per month for the apartment. Is that acceptable?
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your offer. I'm sorry, but I'm not sure if that is a fair price for the 25 square meter apartment. I appreciate your interest, but I would need to see more information about the market value in this area to determine a fair rental price. Would you be able to provide me with some more information on the current rental prices for similar properties in the area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would be happy to provide you with that information. I have done some research and I have found that the average rental price for a 25 square meter apartment in this area is around 700€. However, I am willing to negotiate on the rental price, so I would like to offer 650€ per month for the apartment. What do you think?
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for providing me with that information. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my research, I am willing to accept your offer of 650€ per month for the apartment. I agree to the price of 650€.
name: Heinrich Heine
